subject: RE: [junit] Adding setUp() and tearDown() to TestSuite
msgSnippet: ... OK. You might have a look at Vladimir s add-ons he announced lately on the list. He seems to support this: http://junit-addons.sf.net Regards, Jörg
messageBody:
> I think one very common case is wanting to have the TestSetup
> arrangement, yet still be able to run the tests within the
> suite either
> singly or as a group. There's nothing in the framework that really
> supports this. If you extract a single test from TestSetup
> to run you
> don't get the wrapper.

OK. You might have a look at Vladimir's add-ons he announced lately on the list. He seems to support this: http://junit-addons.sf.net

Regards,
Jörg
